Using the App
=============

Login 
------

**NB:** You can only use the app after creating an account on MosquitoDb Web

| **Step 1:** On running the app you'll be prompted to select the language of your choice either French or English. 


.. image:: ../_images/language.JPEG
   :width: 45%


| **Step 2:** Enter your login credetials then click Login. 


.. image:: ../_images/login.PNG
